---
title: "Single-Cell Report: HVG selection"
output: html_document
params:
    input: "FILE"
    nGenes: 10
---

```{r}
suppressMessages(library("Seurat", quietly = TRUE))
suppressMessages(library("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE))
```

#### Read Data

```{r}
seuratObj <- readRDS(file = params$input)
```

### High variable feature selection

```{r}

topGenes <- head(VariableFeatures(seuratObj), params$nGenes)

plot <- VariableFeaturePlot(seuratObj)
LabelPoints(plot = plot, points = topGenes, repel = T)
```
